definition: A person who writes books, articles, or other literary works, typically in a professional capacity. This term is commonly used to refer to a female individual engaged in the act of writing and publishing written works.

examples.german: Die Autorin hat viele Bücher geschrieben.
examples.english: The author has written many books.
The author won the literature prize.

examples.german: Die Autorin arbeitet an ihrem neuen Roman.
examples.english: The author is working on her new novel.

examples.german: Die Autorin wurde für ihre Arbeit ausgezeichnet.
examples.english: The author was honored for her work.
